entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
